name: Spinal Sensa Monitor
descr:
The Spinal Sensa is a unic tool for diagnostic, test and rehab.

The Spinal Sensa is a spinal posture training aid, which monitors patients spinal curvature. Audibale and vibrational feedback of undesirable postures. 8 practitioners adjustable parameters. Console connects directly to Patient Sensor. Console displays sensor parameters andd patient compliance data on large LCD screen. Displays real-time data from sensor for patient training.

Optional: Spinal Sensa Patient Sensor.

For more information and a fully manual, please look into the product sheet.
